Text: Fwd Fw Resume Received from rlystmailaolcom rlystmailaolcom by airygmailaolcom v with ESMTP Sat Apr Received from rlyybmxaolcom rlyybmailaolcom by rlystmailaolcom AOL with ESMTP id RAA for Sat Apr EDT Received from mtiwmhcworldnetattnet mtiwmhcworldnetattnet by rlyybmxaolcom v with ESMTP Sat Apr Received from hpcustomer by mtiwmhcworldnetattnet InterMail vM with SMTP id TVWHmtiwmhcworldnetatt pcustomer for Sat Apr MessageID bfbfbceca pcustomer ReplyTo James M Love From James M Love To Phillip Love Subject Fw Resume Date Sat Apr MIMEVersion XPriority XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook Express ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartEBFBFDDC XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Phillip I think I told you that my boss LTC Dowling has decided to retire from the Army He is real interested in moving to Houston He has family there A guy he knows who apparently works for Enron but Im not sure suggested he try there for a job while we were travelling together last week we were at Applebys eating dinner and watching the Astros I mentioned that mys sons company paid a bunch of money for that stadium When Ed heard that he asked if you might take a resume in for him I kind of volunteered you Then I got to thinking I think I remember you saying that you get some kind of reward if they hire someone you recommend In my opinion and you know I have those any company that gets this guy has found a gold mine If its a problem Ill understand But if its possible Id really appreciate you taking a copy of this to Enron And by the way I told Ed several weeks ago before I knew he was retiring that if and when he needed my help call me and Id come work for him again So who knows if he gets on in Houston I might get an opportunity to move there too Thanks Pop PS Dont forget Ill be out of town most of the week Original Message From To Date Saturday April AM Subject Resume Jim Please find attched my resume and a list of references Thank you for forward these on to your son I appreciate this opportunity Ed EDDOWLZIP

Fwd FW Golfs new rule Received from rlyzamxaolcom rlyzamailaolcom by airzamailaolcom v with ESMTP Thu Nov Received from btrcluhedu btrcluhedu by rlyzamxaolcom vr with ESMTP Thu Nov Received by BTRCLUHEDU with Internet Mail Service id XSMG Thu Nov MessageID ECADADACDACEBAABTRCLUHEDU From Love Dianne To Subject FW Golfs new rule Date Thu Nov MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service ContentType textplain Original Message From Denise James SMTP Sent Thursday November PM To Lew Rosenfeld Love Dianne Linda Hester Lisa Cross Barry Pulaski Subject FW Golfs new rule Word is circulating around the links that a proposed revision to the rules of golf is being sought in South Florida that would replace the traditional call of Fore When a player hits an errant shot he would be allowed to call Gore while the ball is still in flight He could then replace the ball in the same spot and hit it again The player could do this until he is satisfied the ball is going to drop where he intended to hit it in the first place A recent test of this new rule was recently played out in an exclusive club in Palm Beach County Fla and the first hole took only days to complete

Fwd Forgotten PasswordPST ContentTransferEncoding bit ReturnPath Received from rlyxbmxaolcom rlyxbmailaolcom by airxbmailaolcom v with ESMTP id MAILINXB Fri Jan Received from webnixpaypalcom nodenetworkspaypalcom by rlyxbmxaolcom v with ESMTP id MAILRELAYINXB Fri Jan Received qmail invoked by uid Jan Date Fri Jan MessageId From To Subject Forgotten Password XMailer Unknown No Version ContentType textplain charsetUSASCII This email was sent automatically by the PayPal server in response to your request to recover your password This is done for your protection only you the recipient of this email can take the next step in the password recovery process To reset your password you will need to provide the answers to the two secret questions you chose when you signed up for your PayPal account To continue follow the link below which will lead you to a web page containing your secret questions If you use AOL please copy the link below and paste it into the Web address field fqacAgOnoMWQxfLjHMZNEozmJGicMSzTIPlxTuRekxkKCMEgkfAVWNrBLeg If you need help please contact us at ewffprobdefault Thanks for using PayPal Please do not reply to this email Mail sent to this address cannot be answered For assistance login to your PayPal account and choose the Help link in the footer of any page PROTECT YOUR PASSWORD NEVER give your password to anyone If anyone asks you for your password please follow the Security Tips instructions on the PayPalcom website

Fwd FW Golfs new rule Received from rlyzamxaolcom rlyzamailaolcom by airzamailaolcom v with ESMTP Thu Nov Received from btrcluhedu btrcluhedu by rlyzamxaolcom vr with ESMTP Thu Nov Received by BTRCLUHEDU with Internet Mail Service id XSMG Thu Nov MessageID ECADADACDACEBAABTRCLUHEDU From Love Dianne To Subject FW Golfs new rule Date Thu Nov MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service ContentType textplain Original Message From Denise James SMTP Sent Thursday November PM To Lew Rosenfeld Love Dianne Linda Hester Lisa Cross Barry Pulaski Subject FW Golfs new rule Word is circulating around the links that a proposed revision to the rules of golf is being sought in South Florida that would replace the traditional call of Fore When a player hits an errant shot he would be allowed to call Gore while the ball is still in flight He could then replace the ball in the same spot and hit it again The player could do this until he is satisfied the ball is going to drop where he intended to hit it in the first place A recent test of this new rule was recently played out in an exclusive club in Palm Beach County Fla and the first hole took only days to complete

Fwd Fw Resume Received from rlystmailaolcom rlystmailaolcom by airygmailaolcom v with ESMTP Sat Apr Received from rlyybmxaolcom rlyybmailaolcom by rlystmailaolcom AOL with ESMTP id RAA for Sat Apr EDT Received from mtiwmhcworldnetattnet mtiwmhcworldnetattnet by rlyybmxaolcom v with ESMTP Sat Apr Received from hpcustomer by mtiwmhcworldnetattnet InterMail vM with SMTP id TVWHmtiwmhcworldnetatt pcustomer for Sat Apr MessageID bfbfbceca pcustomer ReplyTo James M Love From James M Love To Phillip Love Subject Fw Resume Date Sat Apr MIMEVersion XPriority XMSMailPriority Normal XMailer Microsoft Outlook Express ContentType multipartmixed boundaryNextPartEBFBFDDC XMimeOLE Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V Phillip I think I told you that my boss LTC Dowling has decided to retire from the Army He is real interested in moving to Houston He has family there A guy he knows who apparently works for Enron but Im not sure suggested he try there for a job while we were travelling together last week we were at Applebys eating dinner and watching the Astros I mentioned that mys sons company paid a bunch of money for that stadium When Ed heard that he asked if you might take a resume in for him I kind of volunteered you Then I got to thinking I think I remember you saying that you get some kind of reward if they hire someone you recommend In my opinion and you know I have those any company that gets this guy has found a gold mine If its a problem Ill understand But if its possible Id really appreciate you taking a copy of this to Enron And by the way I told Ed several weeks ago before I knew he was retiring that if and when he needed my help call me and Id come work for him again So who knows if he gets on in Houston I might get an opportunity to move there too Thanks Pop PS Dont forget Ill be out of town most of the week Original Message From To Date Saturday April AM Subject Resume Jim Please find attched my resume and a list of references Thank you for forward these on to your son I appreciate this opportunity Ed EDDOWLZIP
